effect: [Main] While you have a Tamer with a [Hunter] trait in play, you may use this card without meeting its color requirements.Digivolve 1 of your Digimon into a Digimon card with ＜Save＞ in its text under one of your Tamers for its digivolution cost.
securityEffect: [Security] Add this card to its owner's hand.

name: Seventh Full Cluster
effect: [Trash][Your Turn] If one of your Digimon digivolves into [Beelzemon (X Antibody)], by returning this card to the bottom of your deck, delete 1 of your opponent’s Digimon with the lowest level.[Main] Delete 1 of your opponent’s Digimon with the lowest level.
securityEffect: [Security] Activate this card's [Main] effect.
